column4: hey all - I have a quick question: is there a GUI frontend for the GCC C++ compiler? i'm an experienced programmer on windows, but would like to try my hand at writing linux apps.. anyone know of a good place to start?
Well you need the development package, do you have that?
I dont know of any graphical g++ thing --- ddd is a graphical debugger, and there a million and one C++ IDEs for Ubuntu
